com.salimov.yurii.service.data.interfaces

Interface ResponseService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataService<Response,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResponseServiceImpl

    public interface ResponseService
extends DataService<Response,java.lang.Long>
    The interface of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of the class Response.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Response, DataService
